attributes.description:
Not to be missed. Very neat and well looked after vehicle.
Power Steering, Aircon, and Abs. Remainder of Service Plan, Remainder of Warranty, Service History.  PROFESSIONAL and ACCREDITED finance and insurance (F&I) managers are at hand to advise you regarding finance with all of the major banks. All trade-ins welcome. Test drives welcome, Extended warranties and service plans available On the Road, License, Registration and Number plates NOT included. We deliver country wide. 
We do a 114 point check and roadworthy test  on all our vehicles to ensure your safety and satisfaction.

attributes.description:
Superb Interior and Exterior Condition. 
Complete Motus 101 Quality Checks completed on every vehicle.
All vehicles are sold with a complete service history.
Finance options are available from our dealership.
Optional extended warranties and service plans are available. 
We assist with accessory fitments such as smash and grab, tracker etc.
Price excludes dealer on the road fees. 
Mileage might have changed since time of when ad was placed. Nationwide delivery service 
available on request.  Trade ins are welcome.

attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager JP Thomas and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Select Vanderbijlpark.
